item.title: About me
item.description:
You have found my personal internetial residence. My name is Johan Fagerström and I’m a backend developer, clearly revealed by the fact that I will piggy-back on Fastbyte01’s Hugo theme.

Currently I work with IoT and Cloud at Axis Communications AB in Lund, Sweden. It’s a good company - if you wanna know more, send me an email and we’ll have a spontaneous chat! :)

In my spare time i tinker and muck around with all kinds of tech related to software, computer networks and stuff. As I do something that might be of help to others, I might write a post about it here.

Also, let’s get the elephant out of the room: anything on this site is copy-left as crazy.
